Source.Name: python-jdcal
Source.Summary: This module contains functions for converting between Julian dates and calendar dates.
Source.Description: A function for converting Gregorian calendar dates to Julian dates, and another function for converting Julian calendar dates to Julian dates are defined. Two functions for the reverse calculations are also defined.

Package.Name: python-jdcal
Package.Summary: This module contains functions for converting between Julian dates and calendar dates.
Package.Description: A function for converting Gregorian calendar dates to Julian dates, and another function for converting Julian calendar dates to Julian dates are defined. Two functions for the reverse calculations are also defined.
